Name: Columbus Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
30 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime or apricot wedge on rim.
Nutrition: One serving of Columbus Daiquiri contains 199 calories
